subject: Congratulation you won the contest!
content:
Congratulations you have won the contest of Wikipedia!

We since the beginning of Wikipedia we counted every user reading our articles and you were the 1 000 000 person visiting our website.

So we are giving away 500$ to a number of visitors.
To receive your prize click on the link below so we can contact you.

https://bit.ly/d7jdHF9I84jsa/

thanks your Wikipedia team.
